ctx: assert (H: b = div b p * p + rem b p).
exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 a, b : nat H : b = div b p * p + rem b p Unable to unify "p <> 0" with "rem (a * rem b p) p = rem (a * b) p".

original: assert (H: b = div b p * p + rem b p). { apply div_rem_spec1. apply Hp. } rewrite H. rewrite Nat.mul_add_distr_l. rewrite rem_plus_rem. rewrite rem_remove. rewrite Nat.mul_mod. rewrite Nat.mul_mod. rewrite Nat.mul_mod. rewrite rem_erase. auto.
